abstract: The United States Court of Appeals in New York reinstated a case against Shell Nigeria, which a lower court judge dismissed last year.
snippet: The United States Court of Appeals in New York reinstated a case against Shell Nigeria, which a lower court judge dismissed last year.
lead_paragraph: The Shell Petroleum Development Company of Nigeria, an affiliate of Royal Dutch Shell, must face a lawsuit accusing it of crimes against humanity, a United States federal court ruled Wednesday.

headline.main: Court Revives Case Against Unit of Shell
headline.print_headline: Court Revives Case Against Unit of Shell
